title: Problem with the loading screen
body: So when I want to play a game I choose my champion and then wait till the game starts but the loading screen won't appear until the game actually starts and then I can enter in the loading screen. Help pls

replies.body: There might be something slowing down your network when it's trying to make that new connection with the game servers. Make a couple quick adjustments to your port forwarding and DNS settings really quick to see if we can get you loading into matches a bit quicker. If you aren't sure how to make those changes check out the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for a walkthrough!
